root.name: Ultratron
root.description: Your mission is to avenge the human race, and destroy the four bots of the Apocalypse - Ieiunitas, Bellum, Lues and Letum! System RequirementsPC:OS: Windows XPProcessor: 1GHzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL1.5 capable graphics cardHard Drive: 100 MB HD spaceMac:OS: OSX 10.5.8Processor: 1GHz IntelMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL1.5 capable graphics cardHard Drive: 100 MB HD spaceLinux:Processor: 1GHzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL1.5 capable graphics cardHard Drive: 100 MB HD space
